subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Georgetown center Roy Hibbert scored 17 points and grabbed 12 rebounds and Jeff Green added 11 points and 12 rebounds as the Hoyas outlasted Boston College.
snippet: Georgetown center Roy Hibbert scored 17 points and grabbed 12 rebounds and Jeff Green added 11 points and 12 rebounds as the Hoyas outlasted Boston College.
